title: ReclaiMe Pro v0 196-DVT
description:
T..E..A..M ...D..V..T

P R E S E N T S

ReclaiMe Pro v0.196

Released on 08/08/14 for exclusive usage by
members of the release scene. This isnt something
to share with your school mates and not for sale
Go and ask mommy to buy this app if you like it!

Company: www.ReclaiMe.com
Url: http://www.reclaime-pro.com

Release Information

ReclaiMe Pro - specially tailored for technicians

* Multiple Filesystems
ReclaiMe Pro recovers data from most filesystems in
wide use, namely FAT16/32, exFAT, NTFS, ReFS
EXT2/3/4, XFS, HFS, and HFS

* Partition Recovery
Reads LDM, LVM, MD, and more
Finds lost partitions based on various filesystem
structures in unpartitioned space

* Disk Imager
Highly configurable high-speed imager, suitable for
slight to moderate bad block cases
Sector-by-sector, VHD, and VHDX output

* Disk Editor
Visualize most known partition and filesystem
objects: boot sectors, superblocks, partition
headers in structured view. Low-level data editing
for extra leverage

* RAID Recovery
With ReclaiMe Pro you can both reassemble RAID
automatically or manually. Supports RAID0, RAID10
RAID5, and RAID6 layouts. Highly configurable for
better flexibility

* RAID Analysis
Entropy analysis, content stats, and visualization
for better understanding of RAIDs
Includes mirror maps, zero sectors ratio, and
average entropy. Visualizes data entropy in
parity-based RAIDs

Install Notes

1. Unpack & Install
2. Use Patch.exe

Note:
First of all, at the day of our release, this
application isn't even yet available for public
purchase. Since it will be there at some point and
we want to avoid any conflict which might arise
then in advance, our patch will not cause any flaws
with a legitimately registered key. If you don't
own a valid key, enter random numbers at the
license prompt at startup. You can still change the
key over the license window but it will not be used
within our patched file! Since their license scheme
only offers subscription based online activation
our patch also
deactivates the update- and the license-checks
completely. Thus, you are no longer bound to have
an active web connection at startup to validate
your license. The software can be registered and
works fine on complete offline machines, too
We also disabled the automatic sending of the
filesystem to their server

Group Notes

Currently, we have open positions to fill:

You are a advanced cracker, and you are
interested to work on challenging software
protections, including retail (non public)
supplies, and/or iso utils

You are familar with the common crypto
algorithms, or you are able to defeat commercial
software protection systems, such as Armadillo
ASProtect, FlexLM, etc

You work at a software distribution place
electronic store, software magazine, or any other
place where you are able to get fresh, unreleased
copies of applications, be it the mainstream, or
the more special stuff. Or if you have access in
any other way to registered user areas or such to
obtain retail software, which you are able to give
as a supply - be it for internal use only, or for
release usage

You work at a ISP, University or any other company
with at least 50mbit up/down and are able to
provide/share this connection for our usage
People with an upstream below 50mbit do not need
to apply

You are able to provide hardware for our internal
usage

You are useful in any other way

If one of the above fits your qualifications, do
not hesitate to contact us via jabber:
